title: Netflix Should Adopt Warner's Theater Strategy: Comscore
description: Paul Dergarabedian, Comscore senior media analyst, says Netflix should recognize the value of Warner Bros. as a theatrical partner that boosts a film’s value before it reaches streaming. He speaks with Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
